name: Add Content to Page [Notion]
description: Convert markdown text to Notion blocks and append them to a Notion page. (Converted from Langflow Store for AxieStudio compatibility)

block_id.name: block_id
block_id.info: The ID of the page/block to add the content.

code.name: code

markdown_text.name: markdown_text
markdown_text.info: The markdown text to convert to Notion blocks.
markdown_text.value:
# Heading 1

## Heading 2

### Heading 3

This is a regular paragraph.

Here's another paragraph with an image:
![Image](https://example.com/image.jpg)

## Checklist
- [x] Completed task
- [ ] Incomplete task
- [x] Another completed task

## Numbered List
1. First item
2. Second item
3. Third item

## Bulleted List
- Item 1
- Item 2
- Item 3

## Code Block
```python
def hello_world():
    print("Hello, World!")
```

## Quote
> This is a blockquote.
> It can span multiple lines.

## Horizontal Rule
---


## Link
[Notion API Documentation](https://developers.notion.com)
